entry.tran: （尤指在政府或军队中身居要职者的）助手，副手
entry.def: An aide is an assistant to someone who has an important job, especially in government or in the armed forces.

example.ex: ...a close aide to the Prime Minister.

means.word_mean: 1. an officer who acts as military assistant to a more senior officer
